text: Say our main memory is gigantic and will not limit us. 1. Read the whole data (list of baskets) into main memory. 2a. Use 2 nested loops to generate all pairs of items. (Use k nested loops to generate and count all k-element itemsets.) 2b. Use Triangular-Matrix Method or Triples Method to store counts. 3. Examine which pairs / k-tuples have count bigger than the support threshold s. - yields frequent itemsets
